import React from'react';import Chart from'chart.js/auto';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DataView=_ref=>{let{data,labels,title}=_ref;const chartContainer=React.useRef(null);const chartInstance=React.useRef(null);React.useEffect(()=>{if(chartInstance.current){chartInstance.current.destroy();}if(chartContainer.current&&data.length>0){const ctx=chartContainer.current.getContext('2d');chartInstance.current=new Chart(ctx,{type:'line',data:{labels:labels,datasets:[{label:title,data:data,borderWidth:1,backgroundColor:'RGBA(0, 123, 255, 0.5)'// Color de los datos
}]},options:{scales:{y:{beginAtZero:true}}}});}},[data,labels,title]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("canvas",{ref:chartContainer});};export default DataView;
